reviewText: Recommended for any stylist starting out or for other stylists like myself who are training colleagues and new stylists in learning or perfecting their hair cutting techniques. Featuring the highly rated Randy Topham, a platform artist for Redken, I love the way the techniques are demonstrated using easy step by step instructions allowing anyone to follow and perform these cut and colour techniques. This DVD focuses on classic and more conservative cuts for business men, a must have in our salon since we are located  right in central business district!
